pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Analysis of Stacked Multiple Imputations // Provides methods for inference using stacked multiple imputations augmented with weights. The vignette provides example R code for implementation in general multiple imputation settings. For additional details about the estimation algorithm, we refer the reader to Beesley, Lauren J and Taylor, Jeremy M G (2020) A stacked approach for chained equations multiple imputation incorporating the substantive model doi:10.1111/biom.13372, and Beesley, Lauren J and Taylor, Jeremy M G (2021) Accounting for not-at-random missingness through imputation stacking arXiv:2101.07954.
